readability_reflection: I think string concatenation was more readable for me. It just seems a little easier to know what it will output, maybe it might be because I'm used to working with string concatenation.
comprehension_debugging: Interpolation affected me a little but only when it came to the parentheses. It just looked odd and it just took me a little longer to debug.
preference_rationale: I think I would use interpolation even though I did say it was a bit more difficult to read because it makes code look cleaner and line length shorter.
learning_curve: I have more experience with concatenation which made it much easier to read. Interpolation was just not familiar to me since I usually code in C++, I use more concatenation than anything.
suggestions_improvement: Not really, I feel like they are both as good as they can be it just takes a second to get used to.
